item.title: How We Hire Software Craftspeople
item.description: Incubyte is a combined effort of its team. Working here entails bringing your knowledge, curiosity and authenticity to the table.

item.title: One Year Of Pandemic & One Year Of Incubyte
item.description: It all started when— unbeknownst to the world, a series of lockdowns changed the way India Inc.

item.title: Working at Incubyte
item.description: At Incubyte we strongly believe in finding the right talent, helping them to unleash their maximum capacity, and then getting out of their way to let them do what they do best.

item.title: Feedback & Rapid Prototyping
item.description: “No fixed direction remains valid for long” - Extreme Programming Explained by Kent Beck

item.title: Planning & Communication
item.description: One of our primary process goals is to make frequent, small releases of our working software.
